group_1.textRight: In the end, it's all about how Marius feels.
Who does he love more?@Cornelia or Junia?!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:105301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]…Aah! I forgot something important!

group_1.textRight: Wh…what?

group_1.textLeft: Erm, Lady Cornelia…
Lord Marius entrusted me with this.

group_1.textRight: Lord Marius…?!
…Is that something people usually forget?

group_1.textLeft: Well…I was just about to hand it to her when@everyone suddenly appeared.

group_1.textRight: …So it was our fault, then.

group_1.textLeft: This is a souvenir from Neapolis.
It's the place where he and his father visited@for observation.

group_1.textRight: Neapolis… Now known as Naples.

group_1.textLeft: He said he'll be visiting here soon, so please@look forward to the tales of his travels.

group_1.textRight: Lord Marius…

group_1.textLeft: Hehe…you look so happy.@It was worth the delivery.

group_1.textRight: Why would Marius entrust it with you…?

group_1.textLeft: Because his and Junia's villas are quite close@to each other.
…Yes, he just happened to ask me to do it!

group_1.textRight: Oh yeah, Amaryllis is Junia's handmaiden.
Looks like things have been going great with@Marius since we left. That's a relief★

group_1.textLeft: And I have one other piece of information…

group_1.textRight: What is it?

group_1.textLeft: Your father was speaking with the others at@Lord Marius's villa, as a matter of fact.
From what I overheard...
Lord Marius has been attracted to@Lady Cornelia,
the whole time, from the very beginning!

group_1.textRight: Erm… Lord Marius…?
This is one-sided love no more!@Nice one, Cornelia!
Yes, yes, now we just have to keep going!

group_1.textLeft: …B-but…
It's unlike you to hesitate, Lady Cornelia!

group_1.textRight: Can you please stop making up things about@my personality without asking…?

group_1.textLeft: I only want you to assert your desires more@clearly. For example…
I am yours, Lady Cornelia.
That sort of clarity is admirable!
And yet you're so timid when it comes to@matters of romance!

group_1.textRight: …That's…

group_1.textLeft: But given how Lady Junia and Lord Marius were impossibly close neighbors since the start,
I guess you must've always felt you were at@a disadvantage, Lady Cornelia.

group_1.textRight: Amaryllis, it seems you come and go so@frequently,
to the point you're asked to carry out deliveries.

group_1.textLeft: That's right…

group_1.textRight: And you said Junia was the prime engagement@candidate under the three houses' expectations.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, and in the future I know, that is in fact@what happened…
So this time, we'll have Cornelia do her best!

group_1.textRight: I don't get what you mean by "this time"...
You're the only one undergoing this a second@time, Amaryllis.
Huh… What kind of hunk is this guy for him@to be thought of like this?

group_1.textLeft: Frankly, even from my perspective,@Marius is a wonderful man.
Good-looking, but also kind and intelligent!

group_1.textRight: [chara:102801:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Kyaha★@So are we doing a love quadrangle now?

group_1.textLeft: P-p-p-please stop that!
Just this love triangle alone is confusing enough!

group_1.textRight: Himena was only kidding, right?@You're a fairly straightforward girl.
Even in Ludus, it's easy to read your next move.

group_1.textLeft: Ugh… As an avowed schemer, I feel like those@were killing words…

group_1.textRight: Seriously now, are you into anyone, Amaryllis?

group_1.textLeft: Of course.@Isn't it clear that I like Lady Cornelia?

group_1.textRight: Not that, I meant like, how Marius feels@about Cornelia!

group_1.textLeft: Hmm, I see.@Rather than pursuing love, however…
I think I'd rather devote my life to preserving@the peace of the world.

group_1.textRight: This era will endure for two hundred years.
It is known as "Pax Romana."@...Roman Peace.
It will come to be known as an age of glory.

group_1.textLeft: Really?! Then…what I want is…
I want to be the sweetheart of Pax Romana!

group_1.textRight: When you say that…
It sounds like something a Vestal Maiden@of Light would say.

group_1.textLeft: A what…?

group_1.textRight: A girl who devoted herself to the goddess@Vesta, protector of Rome…
The chosen maidens.
They joined the temple at an early age and@remained unmarried for their entire lives.
Their duty was to protect the Sacred Flame.

group_1.textLeft: …Actually, when I was little,
I met one of the Maidens of Light, who had@Master Cubius accompanying her.
I was asked if I would join the temple.

group_1.textRight: Huh…?

group_1.textLeft: Could these Maidens of Light be Magical Girls?

group_1.textRight: Perhaps that is the secret of Rome's enduring@peace.

group_1.textLeft: …Well, I declined her offer.

group_1.textRight: Eeh?

group_1.textLeft: It's just…I didn't feel suited for the role.
…And then the next time I met Master Cubius…
…It was the day the mountain erupted in flame.

group_1.textRight: Ah…

group_1.textLeft: When I told Master Cubius my wish,
I was ready to give myself as a Vestal Maiden@of Light, but…

group_1.textRight: …But it didn't happen?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, because I was reborn in the world@of the past.

group_1.textRight: As I understand from what I've read,
the girls serving Vesta were required to be the daughters of Roman citizens in the first place.

group_1.textLeft: Ah…that brings up something I've wondered.
What made Master Cubius speak to me?

group_1.textRight: So like, so like!@You're sort of like a Vestal Maiden of Light,
and also something else…?

group_1.textLeft: …I now realize the two titles I wish to@call myself.

group_1.textRight: What's the other?

group_1.textLeft: "The Sweetheart of Pax Romana."
